main event: A bright streak of light illuminated the ship and horizon with a blue-white glow observed on 8 September 1963.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 5 seconds,The object was described as a streak of such brilliance that it lit up the surroundings,The sighting was classified as a meteor sighting of fireball class,Documentation originates from Project Blue Book,The sighting included descriptions of blue-red sparks and blue streaks.
